investigation.title: Changes in DNA Methylation in Arabidopsis thaliana Plants Exposed Over Multiple Generations to Gamma Radiation
investigation.description: Previous studies have found indications that exposure to ionising radiation (IR) results in DNA methylation changes in plants. However, this phenomenon is yet to be studied across multiple generations.

project.funding: The authors would like to thank SCK CEN for the financing of the experiment, the project as well as JV’s and PL’s PhDs.

publications.title: Changes in DNA Methylation in Arabidopsis thaliana Plants Exposed Over Multiple Generations to Gamma Radiation.
publications.summary: Changes in DNA Methylation in Arabidopsis thaliana Plants Exposed Over Multiple Generations to Gamma Radiation. — 10.3389/fpls.2021.611783
